pre: ^Good evening, sir! May I help you?
main: ^Good evening, sir! May I help you?

answer1: ^Ha, is this some old trick to pick up girls? Good try.
^I really don't know why you come here only to ask weird questions like this. Isn't detective a real job?
^This hotel is the same as every other hotel you have been to: People can find places to stay here. It has a lot of rooms with beds, get it?
answer2: ^Just sit here all day. Help people check in and out. The usual stuff.
^It is pretty boring to sit here by myself all day long. I had nobody to talk to.
^? That is a cute name. You want to stay here to keep me company? I am more than happy to have you, as long as you stop asking these weird questions.
answer3: ^That's all? You can always come back to chat with me, you know? The hotel hotline is not always busy.

post: ^You come back again. I know you miss me, detective
